standup.title: Show me the numbers!
standup.summary: Take a look at your team's key product metrics (graphs, totals etc.)
standup.description: Instead of looking at user stories or an Agile wall, have your standup while someone shares a dashboard showing the numbers your team cares about most. This dashboard could contain a graph showing sales pipeline conversions, a table showing the top errors in the last hour, or the number of new user registrations in the day.
benefits: Helps the team connect with the bigger goals they're trying to achieve.
Could reveal if the metrics being used to measure success are flawed, or maybe not visible enough to the team.
